title: TUC supports call for eradication of all asbestos in Britain (TUC - Trades Union Congress) ...
text: ( Source : TUC - Trades Union Congress ) Responding to a report published today (Friday) by the all-party parliamentary group on occupational safety and health calling for the safe removal of all asbestos in Britain, TUC General Secretary
